name: Unstable Hospital
description:
Welcome to the Asylum for the unstable! Your task as a chief is to help your patients regain emotional stability. Cure patients, earn money and prestige! Build facilities! Use dangerous medicine with side effects!

coding and sounds - @littledaimon

design and art - @npol

music - @bublikd

As always with ldjam a lot was cut and unfinished between the initial idea and final submission, but the fun is in the journey!

Game Instructions:

WASD or arrow keys to move camera.

click on buttons and then on the field to use medicine on patients and place structures.

Use the bell to call patients into your clinic. 

Patients have instabilities in 4 emotions that grow over time

if a patient reaches 100 they will die and you will lose prestige. when prestige is lower than zeor - you lose

You gain money for patients  inside your clinic

Serum reduces instability of a random emotion in a patient

Sleeping tablets reduce current emotion values but increase instability

Beds and foods stalls reduce current emotion values of patients that use them

Stabilizers are "aura" items - they reduce growth of 1 emotion around them. click the stabilizer to switch the setting.
